title: Colorado National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery          New Fossils Discovered at Colorado National Monument  Â                 Virtual scenery!   19 Photos  The Monument's plateau-and-canyon country (red rock!) is the eastern gateway to the Colorado Plateau.          Mammals   7 Photos  LOOK for these mammals as you drive along Rim Rock Drive or hike the trails.          Wildflowers   31 Photos  Wildflowers - the entire plant - will be hosted here. Go to "What's Blooming Now?" to see a close up of the wildflower and a bulleted list of facts, including bloom time.            Reptiles & Amphibians   4 Photos  Lizards and Rattlers and Toads, Oh My!          Virtual Hike   18 Photos  Enjoy the beautiful scenery captured along the Monument Canyon trail by visitor and photographer Bill Cummings.
